name: Final Winter (itch) (IDK3091)
description:
BUAS Intake Assignment

Find the way out of this maze full of monsters.

Features:

         - procedurally generated map and rooms so each run is different

         - 3 enemy types

         - 5 potions

         - score

         - path button shows how many rooms are you apart from the final one ( making the game easier)

Controls:

WASD - move

E - equip/unequip crossbow

Mouse - aim

Left Mouse Button - shoot

Right Mouse Button - ice explosion

Escape - pause

Potions:

Red - heal

Green - speed boost

Yellow - fire rate increased

Pink - damage increased

Blue - shield
